channel.title: -Project ~CW~ & ~DA~ [CastleWars & Duel Arena!]-
channel.description:
[i][b]Added to more new things thanks to me m8!
--Sets hooded cloak for each new player --Some doors and ladders fixed[/b][/i]
[b]Source is from wolf thanks man! I have a whole new start yes![/b]
[b]Hello, and welcome to Project CW [CastleWars][/b]
[u][b]What this project is going to focus on is accomplishing a server with castlewars and duel arena only. Duel arena might be added later on
[i][b]Pictures:[/b][/i] [IMG]http://i12.tinypic.com/6gk43yh.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i11.tinypic.com/6ahl761.jpg[/img] Ok I need some help if anyone could![/b][/u]
Server Coders: [*]Moparsc4p3 [*]Pk4pk [*]i blkwolf i
Client coders: [*]None [*]None
If you want to join my mini project please full out this APP and post here!
[code]Name:{Moparscape name} Job:{Which job will you prefer} Exp:{How much experience do you have with the job you have choosen} Proof:{Please provide solid proof with the exp you have listed above} Why you want to join:{Why do you please don't JUST say because I have nothing else to do} Addtion INFO:{Any other information you can provide me/us with?} [/code]
What project as accomplished:
CastleWars INFO: Of course I won't release this without FULLY WORKING CASTLE WARS! CastleWars.java, completely by Byron Correct CastleWars Interface with righ Sendquest ids Fixed so there is UNLIMITED time in CW Attack, Range, Or Mage your Enemies! You cannot attack, range, or mage your own team Working Barricades! Now block player moements Barricades no longer attack back! Correct Flag Pole Object is created where someone dies who has the flag When you capture a flag, it says "Safe" in red to indecate the flag has been taken (Both teams) Also when you capture a flag, Standard is replaced with Empty standard like real RS! When you score a point, the original Flag Standard is back in the enemy's castle You can score a point with the enemies flag if your own team flag is safe OR stolen (HUGE BUG FIX!) Fool-Proof CastleWars Security System (Prevents ALL unfair hacks in CastleWars) Deletes you hood if you're not in castle wars If you log out, you will be teleported to the lobby to stop log hacks If you leave castle wars with flag, it is agian Safe and removes your flag If you get disconnected while you have a flag, it is again Safe and removes your flag Can only take zammy's flag if your on Saradomin team, same for Zamorak team
Duel arena INFO: NONE
What I need help on!
Client ! (PLEASE) Training in castle wars area Fully working specials Fully working duel arean with full staking system!
Based on Project16v.6!
Thanks for your time !
[*]Moparsc4p3

–Some doors and ladders fixed[/b][/i]

Source is from wolf thanks man! I have a whole new start yes!

Hello, and welcome to Project CW [CastleWars]

[u][b]What this project is going to focus on is accomplishing a server with castlewars and duel arena only.
Duel arena might be added later on

Pictures:

6gk43yh.jpg1024×768

Ok I need some help if anyone could![/b][/u]

What project as accomplished:

CastleWars INFO:
Of course I won’t release this without FULLY WORKING CASTLE WARS!
CastleWars.java, completely by Byron
Correct CastleWars Interface with righ Sendquest ids
Fixed so there is UNLIMITED time in CW
Attack, Range, Or Mage your Enemies!
You cannot attack, range, or mage your own team
Working Barricades! Now block player moements
Barricades no longer attack back!
Correct Flag Pole Object is created where someone dies who has the flag
When you capture a flag, it says “Safe” in red to indecate the flag has been taken (Both teams)
Also when you capture a flag, Standard is replaced with Empty standard like real RS!
When you score a point, the original Flag Standard is back in the enemy’s castle
You can score a point with the enemies flag if your own team flag is safe OR stolen (HUGE BUG FIX!)
Fool-Proof CastleWars Security System (Prevents ALL unfair hacks in CastleWars)
Deletes you hood if you’re not in castle wars
If you log out, you will be teleported to the lobby to stop log hacks
If you leave castle wars with flag, it is agian Safe and removes your flag
If you get disconnected while you have a flag, it is again Safe and removes your flag
Can only take zammy’s flag if your on Saradomin team, same for Zamorak team

Duel arena INFO:
NONE

What I need help on!

Client ! (PLEASE)
Training in castle wars area
Fully working specials
Fully working duel arean with full staking system!

Based on Project16v.6!

Thanks for your time !
